summary: Encapsulates a single invocation of an operation within a Keras functional graph, storing the operation reference, the arguments used during the call, and the resulting output tensors. It links to preceding and following nodes via the operationâ€™s inbound and outbound node collections, enabling the graph to be traversed as a directed acyclic structure.
business_intent: Provides the metadata necessary to build, query, and walk the computational DAG of a Keras Function, allowing tools and runtime components to understand how tensors are produced and consumed across multiple calls of the same operation.
